subject: Urgent: Verify your PayPal account immediately
body: Click here to verify your account. Your account has been temporarily suspended due to unusual activity.

subject: Action required: Confirm your identity to protect your account
body: We noticed unauthorized access to your account. Please confirm your identity by clicking the link below.

subject: Update your password immediately for security
body: Your Microsoft account requires immediate password reset. Visit the link below.

subject: Meeting notes from today
body: Hi everyone, please find the meeting notes attached. Looking forward to your feedback.

subject: Your weekly digest - Top repos in your feed
body: Here are the top repositories trending in your network this week.

subject: Your invoice for November 2024
body: Thank you for being a DigitalOcean customer. Your invoice is ready for download.

subject: Your account verification is pending
body: Please verify your account within 24 hours to avoid losing access.

subject: Unusual activity on your account
body: We detected unauthorized access. Confirm your identity immediately.

subject: Breaking news in your industry
body: Check out this urgent update from your industry. Click to read more.

subject: Order confirmation - Please verify details
body: Your order has been placed. Please verify the delivery address is correct.
